forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 46. North wind around 3 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 57, with temperatures falling to around 54 in the afternoon. Northwest wind around 6 mph.

weather_report:
The early morning in Downtown San Francisco welcomes a calm, cool clarity, with the promising chill of a new day. While the streets are washed in gentle darkness, the skyline stands resolutely against the backdrop of a star-speckled sky, hinting fondly at the warm embrace of daylight soon to come. As temperatures hover around the cool mid-forties, a gentle north wind carries with it the crispness of the Bay, a restful balm challenging the remaining vestiges of the night.

As daylight unfolds into Friday, the weather shifts gently towards the partly sunny. Clouds may drift lazily by, casting soft shadows over the city’s iconic streets, while the rising sun chases away any lingering fog that has mastered the coastal winds. Although temperatures will tease their way to the mid-fifties, a light layer—to ward off that persistent chill—will accompany you as you stroll through the city. With nature’s canvas painted in understated hues, today invites a myriad of modest yet satisfying activities: perhaps a leisurely walk by the Embarcadero, taking in the soothing view of the water, or a quiet visit to a local café where the aroma of brew mingles with the morning air, all set against the demure heartbeat of the city awakening around you.
